SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tr_student (name, birth, address, sex, createTime, updateTime, isDeleted) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tr_student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, birth, address, sex, createTime, updateTime, isDeleted from tr_student
